attributes.action: desist from nominating Tony Blair for the post of President of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair is one of our most unpopular prime ministers.  The vast majority of the British people would be offended and embarrassed to see him nominated for this post for which we have no vote.  It would be a disgrace.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
